attributes.action: Legislate The Right to Privacy in Pool Cubicles and Abolish all Cubicle Gaps.

attributes.background: We encourage the Government to look at how service users can be protected from voyeurs who spy at adjoining cubicle 15cm gaps using mirrors or phone cameras/videos in violation of the Sexual Offences Act 2003, sections 67 and 68. Unaccompanied minors from the age of 8 use open-ended Unisex cubicles.
